definition: gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: We got to know each other at last year's Golden Melody Awards.
sentences.chinese: 我们是在去年金曲奖才认识彼此的。

sentences.english: It's the same as the first time I'm nominated in GMA .
sentences.chinese: 那和我第一次入围金曲奖时一样嘛。

sentences.english: THE 12th Singapore Hit Awards (SHA) happening tonight is truly a Singaporean event.
sentences.chinese: 今晚的第12届新加坡金曲奖真是新加坡人的盛会。
